LanguageData.AmbrosiaHigh.stages.0.label: ambrosia warmth
LanguageData.AmbrosiaHigh.stages.0.description: That ambrosia makes me feel a little bit more relaxed, but with more energy too.
LanguageData.AmbrosiaWithdrawal.stages.1.label: ambrosia withdrawal
LanguageData.AmbrosiaWithdrawal.stages.1.description: I just feel heavy and cold all the time. I never thought I'd want a piece of fruit so much.
